ygData.subject: Re: Clouding
ygData.msgSnippet: This is definitely tied to charisma!  You need to max your charisma and see if that gets a response.  If not, swap all your cha stuff for AC, STR & lastly DEX.
ygData.messageBody:
This is definitely tied to charisma! You need to max your charisma and see
if that gets a response. If not, swap all your cha stuff for AC, STR &
lastly DEX.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 4:34 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Clouding


> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> I have several customers that I would like to cast See Invoice on.
Despite
> repeated mailings they still claim that they "never got them". I have
come
> to suspect that the Invoices have somehow become invisible in transit and
> are actually in their in boxes. Can you tell me where this song/spell is
> found? It sounds like Ak'Anon or Erudin libraries perhaps?
>
> [46 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
> > A possible theory I've heard so far (also mentioned by
> > someone here) is that there are mobs that cast see invoice
> > on others.
